alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Marble and Glen Canyons; Yavapai County Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 29 at 3:18AM MST until March 29 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MST THIS MORNING TO 9 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...The Kaibab and Coconino Plateaus as well as the mountains of Yavapai County. * WHEN...From 11 AM MST this morning to 9 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Marble and Glen Canyons; Yavapai County Mountains
